The kite that holds the person is typically a power kite, which is a type of large kite that is designed to generate pull and lift. Power kites are made of lightweight materials and typically have four or more lines attached to them.

Kiteboarding or kitesurfing is an action sport combining aspects of wakeboarding, snowboarding, windsurfing, surfing, paragliding, skateboarding and sailing into one extreme sport. The rider is held up by a kite which is connected to the board by a control bar.
